source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 849,721 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 342,414.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,592, further increased by 943 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 382 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
